title: Episode 62: Circadian Rhythms, Glioblastoma, and Timing in Research(with Lorenzo Lones)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode, our host Ryan Martin is joined by guest and UW-Green Bay alum, Lorenzo Lones. Listen in as they discuss circadian rhythms and glioblastoma, how the present research is conducted, and Lorenzo's recent TEDx talk. If you have yet to hear Lorenzo's full story, make sure to check out his Psi Talk, titled "Timing is Everything."
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, our host Ryan Martin is joined bâ€¦
description: In this episode, our host Ryan Martin is joined by guest and UW-Green Bay alum, Lorenzo Lones. Listen in as they discuss circadian rhythms and glioblastoma, how the present research is conducted, and Lorenzo's recent TEDx talk. If you have yet to hear Lorenzo's full story, make sure to check out his Psi Talk, titled "Timing is Everything."
